datasets.twenty_news_groups module¶

class datasets.twenty_news_groups.TwentyNewsGroupsDataset(remove_header=True, remove_footer=True, remove_quotes=True, dataset_path='/Users/carlos/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/datasets/20_newsgroups')[source]¶

Bases: topics_and_summary.datasets.common.Dataset

Class that represents the 20_newsgroups dataset. This class can apply a first specific preprocessing on the dataset files.

apply_function_to_files(func: Callable)[source]¶

Applies the given function to each of the text files in the corpus.

Parameters:func – The function to be applied to each text file.
as_dataframe() → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Returns the files_dict as a pandas DataFrame.

as_documents_content_list(tokenize_words=True)[source]¶

Returns a list of the content of the documents in the dataset.

Parameters:tokenize_words – If true, each document content is converted into a list of words.
Returns:List of the content of the documents in the dataset.
as_documents_obj_list(tokenize_words=True) → List[datasets.common.Document][source]¶

Returns a list of Document objects of the documents in the dataset.

Parameters:tokenize_words – If true, each document content is converted into a list of words.
Returns:List of Document objects of the documents in the dataset.
get_document_index(category: str, doc_name: str)[source]¶

Returns the index of the specified document.

Parameters:
  • category – Category of the document.
  • doc_name – Name of the document.
Returns:

Returns the index of the specified document or -1 if the documents isn’t in the dataset.
get_original_doc_content_from_disk(doc: topics_and_summary.datasets.common.Document) → str[source]¶

Given a Document object, this method return it’s content obtained from disk as a str.

Parameters:doc – Document.
Returns:Content of the given document obtained from disk.
print_some_files()[source]¶

Prints some text files from the corpus. This function can be used to see how the preprocessing affects the dataset documents.

remove_document(category: str, index_in_category: int)[source]¶

Removes from the dataset the document in the given category with the given index inside that category.

Parameters:
  • category – Category of the document.
  • index_in_category – Index of the document inside that category.
class datasets.twenty_news_groups.TwentyNewsGroupsDocument(directory_name: str, name: str, content: str = None)[source]¶

Bases: topics_and_summary.datasets.common.Document

Class that represents a 20_newsgroups document. Documents of the 20_newsgroups dataset have an additional attribute ‘directory_name’, because documents in this dataset are stored in folders.

get_doc_path_inside_dataset_folder() → str[source]¶

Returns the relative path of the document inside the dataset directory.
